articles.author: Christina Larson
articles.title: Discovery of insects trapped in amber sheds light on ancient Amazon rainforest - AP News
articles.description: Scientists have discovered prehistoric insects preserved in amber in South America for the first time. This amber was found at a quarry in Ecuador and contains ancient insects, pollen, and tree leaves dating back 112 million years. The findings offer insights…
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) Scientists have discovered prehistoric insects preserved in amber for the first time in South America, providing a fresh glimpse into life on Earth at a time when flowering plants wer… [+3510 chars]

articles.author: Paige Smith
articles.title: Amex Boosts Platinum Fee to $895, Adds Resy and Lululemon Perks - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: American Express Co. is boosting the annual fee for its Platinum consumer credit card to $895 — a $200 increase — and adding about $1,500 of potential perks to help customers get over the sticker shock.
